org.restlet
Class UniformCallWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.UniformCallWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
UniformCall
Direct Known Subclasses:
RestletCallWrapper
public class UniformCallWrapper
extends Object
implements UniformCall

Uniform call wrapper. Useful for application developer who need to enrich the call with application related things.

See Also:
The decorator (aka wrapper) pattern

          Wrapped call.

setBestOutput

public void setBestOutput(Resource resource)
                   throws RestletException
Sets the best representation of a given resource according to the user agent preferences. If no representation is found, sets the status to "Not found". If no acceptable representation is available, sets the status to "Not acceptable".

Specified by:
setBestOutput in interface UniformCall
Parameters:
resource - The resource for which the best representation needs to be set.
Throws:
RestletException

getCookieSettings

public List<CookieSetting> getCookieSettings()
Returns the list of cookies to be set in the user agent. Cookie settings can be browsed, added or removed.

Specified by:
getCookieSettings in interface UniformCall
Returns:
The list of cookies to be set in the user agent.

setTemporaryRedirect

public void setTemporaryRedirect(String targetURI)
Asks the user agent to redirect itself to the given URI. Modifies the result output and status properties.

Specified by:
setTemporaryRedirect in interface UniformCall
Parameters:
targetURI - The target URI.
